text: The Gingerbread Man is a 1998 American legal thriller movie directed by Robert Altman and was based on the discarded script by John Grisham. It stars Kenneth Branagh, Embeth Davidtz, Robert Downey Jr., Tom Berenger, Robert Duvall, Daryl Hannah, Famke Janssen and was distributed by PolyGram Filmed Entertainment. ==Other websites== * * Category:1998 thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Altman Category:American independent movies
title: The Gingerbread Man (movie)
